attributes.action: return to / retain weekly rubish collections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned request the Prime Minister to initiate a return to weekly refuse collections and force local councils to initiate local referendums on this subject. The implementation of this policy is down to cost efficencies, in order to continue the use of private refuse collection company’s who are not making sufficient profits for their share holders.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
